mapper.select:
select count(*) from productService a ,serviceSpace b ,bizModelSpace c ,valueSpace d where a.id = b.psId and a.id = c.psId and a.id = d.psId
and a.id = #{id}
and a.id in ( #{a} )
and ((a.name like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (a.description like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (a.lastModifiedUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (a.createdUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.sspp like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.ssp like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.sspc like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.ssc like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.sscc like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.customerSegments like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.customerSegmentsUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.CustomerRelationships like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.CustomerRelationshipsUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.channels like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.channelsUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.keyActivities like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.keyActivitiesUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.keyResources like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.keyResourcesUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.keyPartners like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.keyPartnersUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.costStructure like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.costStructureUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.revenueStreams like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.revenueStreamsUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (d.economical like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (d.ecological like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (d.function like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (d.extrinsicSocial like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (d.activeEmotional like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (d.reactiveEmotional like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (d.intrinsicSocial like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (d.epistemic like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') )

select count(*) from productService a ,serviceSpace b ,bizModelSpace c where a.id = b.psId and a.id = c.psId
and a.id = #{id}
and a.id in ( #{a} )
and ((a.name like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (a.description like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (a.lastModifiedUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (a.createdUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.sspp like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.ssp like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.sspc like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.ssc like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.sscc like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.customerSegments like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.customerSegmentsUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.CustomerRelationships like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.CustomerRelationshipsUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.channels like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.channelsUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.keyActivities like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.keyActivitiesUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.keyResources like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.keyResourcesUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.keyPartners like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.keyPartnersUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.costStructure like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.costStructureUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.revenueStreams like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.revenueStreamsUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.valuePropositionsUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') )

and a.id = #{id}
and a.id in ( #{a} )
and ((a.name like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (a.description like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (a.lastModifiedUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (a.createdUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.economical like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.ecological like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.function like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.extrinsicSocial like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.activeEmotional like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.reactiveEmotional like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.intrinsicSocial like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.epistemic like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.customerSegments like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.customerSegmentsUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.CustomerRelationships like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.CustomerRelationshipsUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.channels like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.channelsUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.keyActivities like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.keyActivitiesUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.keyResources like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.keyResourcesUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.keyPartners like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.keyPartnersUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.costStructure like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.costStructureUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.revenueStreams like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.revenueStreamsUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.valuePropositionsUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') )

select count(*) from productService a ,valueSpace b ,serviceSpace c where a.id = b.psId and a.id = c.psId
and a.id = #{id}
and a.id in ( #{a} )
and ((a.name like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (a.description like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (a.lastModifiedUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (a.createdUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.economical like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.ecological like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.function like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.extrinsicSocial like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.activeEmotional like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.reactiveEmotional like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.intrinsicSocial like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.epistemic like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.sspp like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.ssp like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.sspc like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.ssc like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (c.sscc like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') )

select count(*) from productService a ,bizModelSpace b where a.id = b.psId
and a.id = #{id}
and a.id in ( #{a} )
and ((a.name like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (a.description like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (a.lastModifiedUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (a.createdUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.customerSegments like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.customerSegmentsUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.CustomerRelationships like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.CustomerRelationshipsUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.channels like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.channelsUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.keyActivities like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.keyActivitiesUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.keyResources like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.keyResourcesUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.keyPartners like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.keyPartnersUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.costStructure like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.costStructureUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.revenueStreams like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.revenueStreamsUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') or (b.valuePropositionsUser like '%'|| #{searchKey} ||'%') )
mapper.insert: insert into productService(id, name, picture, description, productServiceSpace, productSpace, touchPointSpace, customerSpace, actorSpace, societySpace, contextSpace, timeSpace, environmentSpace, lastModifiedUser, lastModifiedDate, createdUser, createdDate) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{picture}, #{description}, #{productServiceSpace}, #{productSpace}, #{touchPointSpace}, #{customerSpace}, #{actorSpace}, #{societySpace}, #{contextSpace}, #{timeSpace}, #{environmentSpace}, #{lastModifiedUser}, #{lastModifiedDate}, #{createdUser}, #{createdDate})
mapper.select: select picture from productService where id = #{id}

select * from valueSpace
and id = #{id}
and psId = #{psId}
and economical like '%'|| #{economicalLike} ||'%'
and ecological like '%'|| #{ecologicalLike} ||'%'
and function like '%'|| #{functionLike} ||'%'
and extrinsicSocial like '%'|| #{extrinsicSocialLike} ||'%'
and activeEmotional like '%'|| #{activeEmotionalLike} ||'%'
and reactiveEmotional like '%'|| #{reactiveEmotionalLike} ||'%'
and intrinsicSocial like '%'|| #{intrinsicSocialLike} ||'%'
and epistemic like '%'|| #{epistemicLike} ||'%'
order by ${orderQuery}
mapper.insert: insert into valueSpace(id, psId, economical, ecological, function, extrinsicSocial, activeEmotional, reactiveEmotional, intrinsicSocial, epistemic) values (#{id}, #{psId}, #{economical}, #{ecological}, #{function}, #{extrinsicSocial}, #{activeEmotional}, #{reactiveEmotional}, #{intrinsicSocial}, #{epistemic})
insert into serviceSpace(id, psId, sspp, ssp, sspc, ssc, sscc) values (#{id}, #{psId}, #{sspp}, #{ssp}, #{sspc}, #{ssc}, #{sscc})
mapper.select:
select * from bizModelSpace
and id = #{id}
and psId = #{psId}
and customerSegments like '%'|| #{customerSegmentsLike} ||'%'
and customerSegmentsUser like '%'|| #{customerSegmentsUserLike} ||'%'
and CustomerRelationships like '%'|| #{CustomerRelationshipsLike} ||'%'
and CustomerRelationshipsUser like '%'|| #{CustomerRelationshipsUserLike} ||'%'
and channels like '%'|| #{channelsLike} ||'%'
and channelsUser like '%'|| #{channelsUserLike} ||'%'
and keyActivities like '%'|| #{keyActivitiesLike} ||'%'
and keyActivitiesUser like '%'|| #{keyActivitiesUserLike} ||'%'
and keyResources like '%'|| #{keyResourcesLike} ||'%'
and keyResourcesUser like '%'|| #{keyResourcesUserLike} ||'%'
and keyPartners like '%'|| #{keyPartnersLike} ||'%'
and keyPartnersUser like '%'|| #{keyPartnersUserLike} ||'%'
and costStructure like '%'|| #{costStructureLike} ||'%'
and costStructureUser like '%'|| #{costStructureUserLIke} ||'%'
and revenueStreams like '%'|| #{revenueStreamsLike} ||'%'
and revenueStreamsUser like '%'|| #{revenueStreamsUserLIke} ||'%'
and valuePropositionsUser like '%'|| #{valuePropositionssUserLIke} ||'%'
order by ${orderQuery}
mapper.insert: insert into bizModelSpace(id, psId, customerSegments, customerSegmentsUser, CustomerRelationships, CustomerRelationshipsUser, channels, channelsUser, keyActivities, keyActivitiesUser, keyResources, keyResourcesUser, keyPartners, keyPartnersUser, costStructure, costStructureUser, revenueStreams, revenueStreamsUser, valuePropositionsUser) values (#{id}, #{psId}, #{customerSegments}, #{customerSegmentsUser}, #{CustomerRelationships}, #{CustomerRelationshipsUser}, #{channels}, #{channelsUser}, #{keyActivities}, #{keyActivitiesUser}, #{keyResources}, #{keyResourcesUser}, #{keyPartners}, #{keyPartnersUser}, #{costStructure}, #{costStructureUser}, #{revenueStreams}, #{revenueStreamsUser}, #{valuePropositionsUser})
